commit.message:
Extends the query tool to provide a tabular output.

- Properties are now properly sorted and formatted
- References to other entities are shown has hyperlinks
- SQL entities are now treated equally
- A list of all known entity types is output if no type is selected
Prevents logging an invalid administrator query into the syslog.

Marks the virtual directories as properly readonly.

Otherwise we attempt to create files there (which is not possible).
Removes a redundant method (identical to parent).
Forces an update of all maven dependencies without caching.
